title: Morning Joe 3/25/21
description: A new court filing suggests members of extremist groups were in touch with one another before arriving in Washington for the January 6 Capitol riot. Also, riot suspects ramped up donations to Trump after his election defeat. The panel discusses.
author: news.podcasts@nbcuni.com (NBC News)
